import './authenticate.css'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import React, { Component } from 'react' class Authenticate extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.state = { user:'', password:'', firstName:'', surName:'', verifyUser:'', day:'', month:'', year:'', gender:'', signUpPassword:'', gender:'' } this.userAuthentication = this.userAuthentication.bind(this); } saveUser = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.id]:e.target.value }) } userAuthentication = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('user', this.state); this.props.dispatch({type:'isLogin',payload:this.state}) } render() { return (
